summary: Small mod that makes movement more fluid, fixing several annoying issues in vanilla!
descriptionHtml:
Features:

>Walk backwards at the same speed as forwards, ideally used with mods such as 360 Walk (it includes a similar fix but failed to deliver it properly).
>No speed penalty to drawing bows.
>No speed penalty to casting.
>Lesser speed penalty to blocking.
>Blocking now has two speeds, your normal run speed and a walk speed that was missing from vanilla.
>Sneaking has less of a speed penalty.

I recommend using this mod with Attack Commitment or Mortal Enemies, as it was made with them in mind and highly compatible with them.
author: CogentCoda
